          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">Tövisszúró gébics</string>
            <string language="en-US">Red-backed shrike</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rot-unterstütztes shrike</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">shrike Rouge-soutenu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">shrike Vermelho-suportado</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">shrike Rosso-sostenuto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κόκκινος-υποστηριγμένος shrike</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">shrike Rojo-movido hacia atra's</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">Tövisszúró gébics képe, amint felszúr egy sáskát a tövisre</string>
            <string language="en-US">Picture of the red-backed shrike puncturing a locust to its thorn</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">állat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">madár</string>
          </keyword>

            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abbildung des rot-unterstützten shrike, das eine
Heuschrecke zu seinem Dorn durchbohrt</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Image du shrike rouge-soutenu perforant une 
sauterelle à son épine</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Retrato do shrike vermelho-suportado que punciona
uns locustídeo a seu espinho</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Immagine dello shrike rosso-sostenuto che perfora
una locusta alla relativa spina</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εικόνα κόκκινος-υποστηριγμένη shrike τρυπώντας μια 
ακρίδα στο αγκάθι του</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cuadro del shrike rojo-movido hacia atra's que 
pincha una langosta a su espina</string>
          </description>
